title: The AI Pioneer Who Wants to Replace Teachers With Algorithms
description: Derek Li pulled his sons out of school to be taught by artificial intelligence. Now he’s betting the US is ready for machine-led learning.
content: On a scorching July afternoon in Shanghai, dozens of Chinese students hunch over tablet screens, engrossed in English, math and physics lessons. Algorithms track every keystroke, and the seconds spent pondering each question. A pair of teaching assis... [448 chars]

title: OpenAI Probed Over Risks to Teen Safety After Senate Testimony
description: A key Republican US senator demanded OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman hand over documents and information about the risks ChatGPT poses to children and teens, expanding a congressional probe into artificial intelligence chatbots.
content:

title: North Korea's Kim Jong Un oversees drone testing, KCNA says
description: SEOUL - North Korean leader Kim Jong Un oversaw the testing of unnamed drones on Thursday and ordered their capabilities be strengthened through artificial intelligence, state media KCNA said on Friday. Read more at straitstimes.com.
content:

title: Elon Musk Has Focused on xAI Since Leaving Washington
description: Mr. Musk spent the summer at his artificial intelligence start-up xAI, trying to match the runaway success of OpenAI. The result was chaos.
content:
In a rare companywide meeting on Wednesday, Elon Musk laid out his vision for xAI, his two-year-old start-up that is chasing its competitors in the race to build artificial intelligence.
Using the lofty language that has typified Mr. Musk’s A.I. drea... [1973 chars]

title: Europe’s Impossible Choice: AI Development or Net Zero?
description: Artificial intelligence requires vast amounts of electricity. AI processors run 24 hours a day, enabling computers to think like humans.
content:
Guest essay by Steve Goreham

title: Amid India’s AI safety push, Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw says governance framework to be released by Sept 28
description: The government will release an Artificial Intelligence (AI) governance framework by Sept 28 that will define safety boundaries, Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw said

title: Trump's AI plan supports antitrust enforcement, DOJ official says
description: U.S. antitrust enforcers are on guard against anticompetitive behavior in the artificial intelligence sector as part of the Trump administration's plan to cement U.S. AI dominance, a Department of Justice official said in New York on Thursday.
content: NEW YORK, Sept 18 (Reuters) - U.S. antitrust enforcers are on guard against anticompetitive behavior in the artificial intelligence sector as part of the Trump administration's plan to cement U.S. AI dominance, a Department of Justice official said i... [1814 chars]

title: Is Oracle really all-seeing on AI?
description: The Texas-based computer software company is on a roll but could be vulnerable when the artificial intelligence frenzy subsides
content: Its sudden appeal today lies in its extraordinary success in bagging orders from the AI princes: companies like OpenAI, the creator of ChatGPT, Google with its Gemini service and Musk’s xAI. They need the data-centre capacity to store and crunch info... [3104 chars]

title: OECD report highlights great progress made by Greece in the use of AI
description: Greece has made great strides in adopting Artificial Intelligence and toward a digital future, according to a report released by the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) on Thursday.
